Amazon daily deals for March 19: Security camera systems, wireless headphones, cooling mattress covers, and more

Share
Tweet
What's This?
Just to let you know, if you buy something featured here, Mashable might earn an affiliate commission.
By Carlos CadornigaMashable Deals2018-03-19 13:37:44 UTC

Grab a refurbished Netgear Arlo Pro security system on sale today for $230 off, which includes two cameras and works with smart hubs like Alexa and Fire TV, so you can pull up your live feed using just the sound of your voice. The Amazon Tap is also on sale today for $30 off.

SEE ALSO: This is not your parents' camera tripod

There are also other great deals on skincare items, mattress pads, and a set of old-fashioned cordless handset phones if that's something you happen to need. 

Here are the best deals:

Deals for tech addicts

Netgear Arlo Pro by NETGEAR Security System with Siren (Certified Refurbished) — $270 (list price $500)

VTech CS6529-4 DECT 6.0 Phone Answering System — $48.80 (list price $79.95)

Car charger for Nintendo Switch — $12.74 (list price $19.99)

Amazon Tap: Alexa-enabled Bluetooth speaker — $99.99 (list price $129.99)

Home and beauty deals

Cooling Top Mattress Pad with Fitted Skirt — $117 (list price $155)

KLAIRS Freshly Juiced Vitamin Drop — $16.40 (list price $23.50)

Mandelic acid 5% Skin prep water — $16 (list price $23)

Klairs Rich Moist Soothing cream — $15.50 (list price $24)

Lightning deals (get 'em while they're hot)

COWIN E7 Active Noise Cancelling Bluetooth Headphones — $53.19 (list price $150)

Sycees SC01 Plug in LED Night Light Lamp — $10.49 (list price $24)

Lamicall Adjustable Cell Phone Stand — $9 (list price $50)

iPhone Cable Guzon 3 Pack — $9.74 (list price $40)

Topics: Mashable Deals, security camera, security system, shopping-amazon, shopping-daily-deal, shopping-daily-deals, Tech, Wireless Headphones

Heads up: All products featured here are selected by Mashable's commerce team and meet our rigorous standards for awesomeness. If you buy something, Mashable may earn an affiliate commission.
